Twister


Twister: Okay, let's ask her. Over Commlink or face to face?

*Tw=
ister asks Sinesis*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To:=
 nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:37 PM
  Subject: Re:=
 NBW


  "Maybe, how about we ask Dracona?" Sinesis says to Twister...
    =
----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
    Subject: Re: NBW


=
    Twister

    *Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

    Twister: =
Do you know of anyone that would like to die?

    *Twister asks Sinesis*

=
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
      Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:52 PM
      Subject: Re: =
NBW


      Sinesis eagerly shakes Twister's hand.

      "Partners!" Sines=
is says...
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: iloveallliza=
rds 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 =
5:40 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


        Twister


        *Twister looks=
 at Sinesis*

        Twister: It seems that we have something in common an=
d I need a partner too.

        *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

   =
     Twister: Partner?

        *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand extende=
d*

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
      =
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:45 PM=

          Subject: Re: NBW


          "Traveling alone, though? What abou=
t all the bots we killed together? What about all of the times we took shot=
s for each other? It's horribly not fair. I wish I had a partner still." Si=
nesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

          "Hey, will you be my pa=
rtner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
=
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
        Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:38 AM
            Subject: Re: NBW
=


            Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



            *Twister looks at th=
e sword and sighs*

            Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact =
that, my sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

=
            *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles=
 into her arm compartment*


            *Blizzard looks at Sinister and sm=
iles*

            Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base.


=

            *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

            Infectra: I t=
rust the both of you......I did trust the others but....

            *Infe=
ctra sighs*

            Infectra: I need to stop thinking of things that u=
pset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times because there were hardl=
y none.

            *Infectra says to Airbomber and grins*


             =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: THECODE 
              T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
=
              Subject: Re: NBW


              Sinesis frowns. He holds up =
his brothers sword.

              "He left this here, without it, what sha=
ll he do? We have simular problems. I just wish I still had him by my side.=
" Sinesis said to Twister.

              Sinister held Blizzards hand, ill=
egal fireworks shooting off in his eyes.

              Stranato calls out.=


              "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbom=
ber sits down and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

              "Hopefully, =
the Maximals will listen to us, they must know of the occurences happening.=
 I trust Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been=
 good, but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his wo=
rds...
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: =
ilovealllizards 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Se=
nt: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
                Subject: Re: NBW


 =
               Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



                *Twister looks =
at Sinesis*

                Twister: I've decided to let my sister be...Fo=
r she's my sister and I love her too much to pull her away from the she lov=
es....

                *Twister opens her arm compartment and pulls out a =
two small pieces of energon both shaped like an eagle*

                Twi=
ster: Our parents gave us both one to unite us as sisters and friends forev=
er and always help each other. I found Blizzard's on the ground in front of=
 the base. I doubt she dropped it by accident.....

                *Twiste=
r holds out to Sinesis so he can see*



                (OOC: Ack! I meant=
 The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sorry.)

                *Blizzard skips out=
 of the cave and walks next to Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds =
her hand out wanting Sinister to hold her hand*



                *Infectr=
a follows Stranato and Airbomber into the Maximal Base*


                 =
 ----- Original Message ----- 
                  From: THECODE 
           =
       To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, August 03,=
 2000 6:59 PM
                  Subject: Re: NBW


                  Sinesi=
s sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                  Si=
nister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

       =
           "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

        =
          Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since they were =
never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on in...
    =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: ilo=
vealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                 =
   Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
                    Subject: Re:=
 NBW


                    Infectra/Wrath/Blizzard/Twister


              =
      *Infectra follows Stranato and Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*


=

                    *Wrath gets into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Ma=
ximal Base awaits his repairs*



                    *Blizzard does a litt=
le skip out of the cave walks next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and hol=
ds her hand out towards his wanting to hold hands with him*



            =
        (OOC: Twister is out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come =
back anyway.)

                    *Twister leaves the location of the Maxi=
mal Base seeing as how everyone was else where and went back to Team Ultima=
s Base and sits at the same table as Sinesis*

                    Twister:=
 I don't know what I'm going to do....I end up here thinking I'll find a ni=
ce Team where I'm wanted and me and my sister could be sisters and friends.=
..I was such a fool for believing such happiness could happen.....

       =
             *Twister puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*=



                      ----- Original Message ----- 
                    =
  From: THECODE 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
          Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                      Sub=
ject: NBW


                      Stranato and Airbomber walked toward the =
Maximal base.

                      Gangon, still dying.

                =
      Deemos and Inzola confront one another several times, but Inzola alwa=
ys runs from Deemos.

                      Etchingar called out to Megatro=
n.

                      "Hey, do I got the job?" He asked.

             =
         Time Bomb waited patiently and Land Mine was healed now. Land Mine=
 looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

                      Sinister c=
ame out of the cave (Hopefully with Blizzard.) and started back toward Team=
 Ultima's base.

                      Sinesis was healed and sat down next=
 to Twister...
